Message:
Life got really tough,
but my mom and dad
continued going to the Church.

Any food they get
they give to me.
The two of them
haven’t eaten in days.

Whenever they see
my worried face,
all they do is say sorry...

But, I’m the one who’s
supposed to be saying sorry...

Oh, I know!
The Wish of the Holy Night!

If you wish on a star
on the Holy Night,
you’re wish’ll come true!
That’s what Mom said!

Mmm... Maybe I need to wish
on a big star for my wish though...

Oh! The star on top of the tree
in the town square is big!
Perfect!

As I was on my way
to the town square,
I found a strange hole
in the ground.
